feed.title: AliasVault Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Minor bugfix release that fixes a regression introduced in the browser extension and mobile app in the 0.17.0 release.

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Browser extension autofill popup search/filter does not work correctly by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/841
  • iOS app changing password for existing credential sometimes does not get saved by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/842

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.17.0...0.17.1

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.17.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Minor bugfix release addressing an issue in the docker-compose.yml file, which mistakenly included hardcoded references to Docker container version 0.16.1. This accidental commit prevented the ./install.sh update command from properly retrieving the latest container versions, affecting self-hosted installations.

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Restore docker-compose.yml container versions to :latest by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/849

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.17.1...0.17.2

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.17.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Minor bugfix release that makes the import process more robust. Previously the import would fail entirely if a 2FA authenticator code could not be parsed. With this change all credentials will still be imported but show an error to the user when the credential item is opened instead.

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Vault import fails if one or more 2FA tokens cannot be parsed by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/853

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.17.2...0.17.3

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  1. Native Android App Launch!: release 0.18.0 launches the official AliasVault native Android app, now available on the Google Play Store! üéâ This release marks a major milestone, as AliasVault is now available on all major platforms: web, browser extension and mobile (iOS + Android). This new app enables native autofill features for Android and protects your vault contents with on-device biometrics.

  2. Quality-of-life improvements: various smaller improvements to e.g. the browser extension which should make the autofill popup now trigger only on login related fields and get less in the way. Also fixes across all platforms to prevent UI overflow for credential details, and extra admin panel options.

Read more details about this release on our blog: https://www.aliasvault.net/news/aliasvault-0.18.0-released

Full Changelog

üöÄ New Features

  • Add native Android app by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/863
  • Add Android app download links to client by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/871
  • Add "revoke all" option to admin page to revoke all active user sessions by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/875
  • Show amount of emails received per user to admin users list by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/877

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Use absolute path for docker volume bind mounts by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/860
  • Browser extension using a self-hosted URL with no https prefix causes a crash by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/865
  • Browser extension autofill triggers on too many non-login input fields by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/867
  • API login initiate endpoint could potentially return information whether a certain username exists by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/869
  • Long username or email text overflows its parent container by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/873

üß© Dependencies Updates

  • Remove all sqlite server dependencies by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/845

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.17.3...0.18.0

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

This minor bugfix release resolves login issues in the mobile app and browser extension for users with capitalized usernames by making username handling case-insensitive (matching the main web app), and improves biometric availability detection in the app on supported devices.

üöÄ New Features

  • Automatically build and attach android apk on GitHub release by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/891

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Mobile app login username is case sensitive but should be case insensitive by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/888
  • App does not properly check if biometrics are available before asking the user if they want to use it by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/889

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.18.0...0.18.1
